function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for pedestrian safety and traffic flow in parking design","Impact":"Increased risk of accidents and pedestrian injuries","Mitigation":"Incorporating traffic calming measures, clear pedestrian pathways, and visibility enhancements in parking design","Technologies":"CCTV cameras, traffic flow analysis software, traffic lights, speed bumps, and reflective paint for visibility","People":"Pedestrians, drivers, and parking lot users","Owner":"Urban planners, architects, and local traffic authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate provisions for disabled parking spaces","Impact":"Exclusion of disabled individuals from accessing facilities","Mitigation":"Ensuring sufficient and accessible designated parking spaces for disabled individuals in compliance with accessibility regulations","Technologies":"Accessible parking symbols, designated signage, and parking space dimensions as per accessibility guidelines","People":"Disabled individuals, facility users, and building owners","Owner":"Facility managers, architects, and accessibility compliance officers"},{"Description":"Inefficient land-use in parking design","Impact":"Unnecessary consumption of space and resources","Mitigation":"Implementing smart parking design, utilizing technology for optimal space utilization, and integrating multi-level or automated parking systems","Technologies":"Smart parking sensors, automated parking systems, parking space optimization software, and IoT integration for parking management","People":"Property developers, urban planners, and environmental conservation groups","Owner":"Property developers, city planners, and local government"}]}
